catalogue_raissonne: Hind prisons 10 ii/iii, F.33, Robison 36 v/vi
creditline: The Martha T. Wallace Memorial Fund, 1930
provenance: Erbach-Erbach family, Schloss Erbach Hofbibliothek, Erbach (Odenwald), Germany. F. H. Bresler Gallery, Milwaukee, Wisc.
text: This demonic scene combines the horror of prisoners suffering in brutal surroundings with a symphony of rhythms consisting of curves and angles, darkness and light.
title: Prisoners on a Projecting Platform
